dcterms:description: A high-quality legal dialogue dataset constructed for fine-tuning legal language models, containing various types of legal dialogues including legal term explanations, legal judgments, and judicial interpretations.
dcterms:title: Knowledge-INtensive LEgal Dialogue (KINLED)

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of multi-turn legal consultation dialogues sourced from real legal consultations, aimed at enhancing the performance of legal language models in multi-turn dialogue scenarios.
dcterms:title: MUltiple Rounds LEgal Dialogue (MURLED)
